dashboard.title: What will we solve today?
dashboard.subtitle: Orchestrating autonomous agents to solve complex reasoning tasks.
dashboard.inputPlaceholder: Describe your problem or reasoning task...

general.reducedMotionDesc: Minimize animations for a more static experience.
general.dyslexicFontDesc: Switch to OpenDyslexic or increased spacing.
general.highContrastDesc: Increase legibility with stronger borders and solid backgrounds.

strategic.agentDesc: The master planner and decision maker.
strategic.maxWorkersDesc: Number of agents working in parallel
strategic.smartFallbackDesc: Fallback to alternative models if overloaded.

tactical.agentDesc: Executes specific sub-tasks defined by the root.
tactical.syncToggleDesc: Inherit settings from the Root agent for execution tasks.
tactical.smartFallbackDesc: Switch to an alternative model on error

audit.agentDesc: Validates the output of the Tactical agent.
audit.syncToggleDesc: Use the main brain for validation (recommended for consistency).
audit.smartFallbackDesc: Fallback to alternative models if overloaded.

prompts.title: Prompts Manager
prompts.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this prompt?
prompts.subtitle: Manage your AI reasoning templates
prompts.emptyStateDesc: Your library is currently empty. AI reasoning templates you create will appear here.

history.title: History
history.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation?

chips.market: Analyze a competitive market for AI startups
chips.strategy: Build a go-to-market strategy for a SaaS product
chips.debug: Debug a distributed system memory leak
chips.research: Summarize recent advances in reinforcement learning

market.title: Market Analysis
market.prompt: Perform a comprehensive competitive analysis for a new AI-powered SaaS startup entering the European market. Identify key competitors, market gaps, and strategic positioning opportunities.

strategy.title: Product Strategy
strategy.prompt: Design a go-to-market strategy for a B2B SaaS platform focused on automated document processing. Include pricing model, launch timeline, and customer acquisition channels.

debug.title: Code Debugging
debug.prompt: Analyze and debug a memory leak in a distributed Node.js microservices architecture. The system uses Redis for caching and PostgreSQL for persistence. Memory usage grows 200MB/hour.

research.title: Research Synthesis
research.prompt: Synthesize the latest research (2024-2025) on multi-agent reinforcement learning. Compare approaches, highlight key breakthroughs, and identify open problems.

solution.title: Final Solution
solution.subtitle: Synthesized output from the reasoning engine

toast.taskCompleteMsg: Your reasoning task has been solved successfully.

step1.title: Welcome to AutoLogic
step1.desc: An advanced reasoning engine that orchestrates autonomous agents to solve complex problems step by step.

step2.title: Describe Your Problem
step2.desc: Type your complex task in the input field. AutoLogic will analyze, plan, and execute a multi-step reasoning process.

step3.title: Watch the Engine Think
step3.desc: Follow the reasoning process in real-time with the visual flow diagram and progress bar. Each step is validated by an H2 Critic.

step4.title: Get Verified Results
step4.desc: Receive a comprehensive solution with quality score. Export as Markdown or PDF, and browse your history anytime.
